name: Claude.ai Free
summary_and_recommendation: Claude.ai Free presents MEDIUM RISK primarily due to complete lack of enterprise controls and admin oversight. While Anthropic demonstrates strong practices in data handling and training policies, the free tier lacks essential enterprise features like SSO, admin dashboards, and audit capabilities. Recommended for low-risk use cases with public/marketing data only. Consider upgrading to Claude Enterprise for any business-critical applications.
primary_use_case: General AI assistance and content creation
assessment_notes: High confidence assessment based on comprehensive public documentation from Anthropic's privacy center and help documentation. Some gaps in specific technical implementation details.

recommended_restrictions: Block access to sensitive data repositories
Require explicit approval for PHI/PII use cases

recommendations.title: Restrict to Public Data Only
recommendations.description: Given the lack of enterprise controls, limit Claude.ai Free usage to public/marketing content and general knowledge queries only

recommendations.title: Implement Usage Monitoring
recommendations.description: Deploy network monitoring to track Claude.ai usage patterns and detect potential sensitive data exposure

recommendations.title: Consider Enterprise Upgrade

detailed_assessment.summary_and_recommendation: Claude.ai Free presents MEDIUM RISK primarily due to complete lack of enterprise controls and admin oversight. While Anthropic demonstrates strong practices in data handling and training policies, the free tier lacks essential enterprise features like SSO, admin dashboards, and audit capabilities. Recommended for low-risk use cases with public/marketing data only. Consider upgrading to Claude Enterprise for any business-critical applications.

geographic_control.justification: Known secure regions (US, EU) with contracts - Anthropic is US-based with documented security practices, but specific data residency controls are not detailed for free tier users.

encryption_standards.justification: Enterprise-Grade Encryption - AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit + vendor-managed keys + published encryption specifications - Anthropic documents 'Your data is automatically encrypted both while in transit, and stored (at rest)' with industry-standard encryption practices.

data_retention.justification: Clear Limited Retention - Specific retention periods documented (â‰¤90 days) + automatic deletion procedures + user deletion controls - Multiple sources confirm 'User data is retained for a maximum of 90 days for system functionality and user convenience, after which it is automatically deleted' with user control options.

model_training.justification: Contractual guarantee of no training use - Anthropic explicitly states 'By default, we will not use your prompts and conversations from Free Claude.ai, Pro, or Max plans to train our models' with training only occurring if users explicitly opt-in through feedback mechanisms.

data_sharing.justification: No third-party sharing - Anthropic's privacy documentation indicates no sharing of user conversations with third parties for training or commercial purposes.

admin_management.justification: No Admin Oversight - Individual accounts only + no organizational visibility + no centralized management - Claude.ai Free provides no enterprise admin controls, user management, or organizational oversight capabilities.

audit_capabilities.justification: No Audit Capabilities - No activity logs OR logs not accessible to administrators OR no usage tracking - Free tier provides no audit logs, usage tracking, or administrative visibility into user activities.

integration.justification: No Enterprise Integration - Username/password only + no SSO + no enterprise identity management - Claude.ai Free requires individual account creation with no SSO or enterprise identity management integration.

regulatory_violations.justification: Mostly Compliant - Basic compliance certifications + privacy policy compliant with major regulations + some gaps in specialized requirements - Anthropic maintains privacy policies compliant with major regulations, though specific compliance certifications are not detailed for free tier.

data_processing_transparency.justification: Basic Transparency - General data processing description + retention periods stated + some third-party relationships disclosed - Anthropic provides clear data processing descriptions and retention policies, though detailed technical implementation specifics are limited.

documentation_and_support.justification: No Transparency - No privacy policy OR refused to provide documentation OR contradictory statements in different documents - While Anthropic provides privacy documentation, the free tier lacks comprehensive security documentation, enterprise support channels, and detailed technical specifications typically expected for business use.
